thread.title: TCS Standalone December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 53,883.00 crore, up 5.98% Y-o-Y
thread.title_full: TCS Standalone December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 53,883.00 crore, up 5.98% Y-o-Y

author: Abhishek Shingare
title: TCS Standalone December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 53,883.00 crore, up 5.98% Y-o-Y
text: Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Tata Consultancy Services are: Net Sales at Rs 53,883.00 crore in December 2024 up 5.98% from Rs. 50,844.00 crore in December 2023. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 11,832.00 crore in December 2024 up 10.03% from Rs. 10,753.00 crore in December 2023. EBITDA stands at Rs. 16,845.00 crore in December 2024 up 4.16% from Rs. 16,172.00 crore in December 2023. TCS EPS has increased to Rs. 32.71 in December 2024 from Rs. 29.45 in December 2023. TCS shares closed at 4,038.85 on January 09, 2025 (NSE) and has given 1.34% returns over the last 6 months and 9.46% over the last 12 months.
